page.title: 03PRIMARY SCHOOL IN N.S.
page.content: The school I attend is{Penninghame {Primary School.}It has a roll of two_hundred and thirty_three pupils, not the highest in its history but far greater than in 1873 when forty_four pupils attended on the first day of term.It is the biggest school in the area with one headmaster,one assistant head,nine teachers,one secretary and one janitor.As well as class teachers there are P.E.,art,music,remedial teachers and teachers of musical instruments. In 1964 the school moved into the present building.This building has a big playground which is divided into two parts,one for the infants and one for the bigger pupils.The bigger pupils have a netball court and a football pitch.Near our school is a church to which we go at the end of term.
